member.name: T:Gnoss.ApiWrapper.Helpers.LogApplicationInsightsHelper
member.summary:
Helper to save logs an traces
The file generated will always have the creation date before the name. Example: 2015_05_17_error.log
There are seven posible levels:
- FATAL: Critical system messages. The application must be aborted after a fatal error
- ERROR: Errors produced by the API or an unexpected API response
- WARN: Something goes wrong, but it's not too important
- INFO: Verbose mode. Information message about the application state
- DEBUG: Only for development enviroments. Generate message for every API comunication
- TRACE: Adds more message to DEBUG mode, with information about the request and response data
- OFF: Log disabled
Class without constructor, following the singleton pattern. To use it, use the static property Instance.

member.name: M:Gnoss.ApiWrapper.Model.GnossDate.RomanToDecimal(System.String)
member.author: Lorena Ruiz Elsegui
member.summary:
Converts a roman number to decimal number
Code gets from http://my.opera.com/RAJUDASA/blog/2013/04/08/c-convert-roman-numbers-to-decimal-numbers
Explicacin: code process: convert string to char array. convert each char (roman number) to its equivalent decimal number and stores them in array. Iterating over array, check whether low number is left side next to high number if yes, remove that low number from high number else add both numbers. Assumes only one low number comes left side and max 3 low numbers right side at a time of high number.(ex: IV and VIII)
Try invoking the above method with these sample Roman Numbers: "MMXIII" -> 2013; DCCCXLI -> 841; MCMLXVII -> 1967; XIX -> 19

For example: in http://www.gnoss.com/items/Application_223b30c1-2552-4ed0-ba5f-e257585b08bf_9c126c3a-7850-4cdc-b176-95ae6fd0bb78 the entity identifier is: 9c126c3a-7850-4cdc-b176-95ae6fd0bb78 If an entity has more than one property, that Guid indicates that all properties belong to the same entity. Without that Guid, an entity is created for each property.
Indicates whether the home must be updated
Default 2. Number of retries loading of the failed load of a resource
Community short name where the AuxiliaryEntitiesTriplesToInclude will be loaded
member.returns: Indicates whether the properties have been inserted in the auxiliar entity

member.name: M:Gnoss.ApiWrapper.ResourceApi.GetNotHierarquicalCategoriesIdentifiersList(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: This method obtains the categories identifiers of the community thesaurus for each of the categories of the resource to load, considering the case of a multilanguage thesaurus.For each of the thesaurus category, it first checks if the thesaurus is multilanguage (in this case, it contains |||), then each of these categories is converted to string[] and every component of the string is compared with every single resource category.If they are equal, the identifier of this category is obtained and stored in the list of the resource categories. If that is not a multilanguage thesaurus, it checks if the dictionary with the thesaurus categories contains a key that is equal to the category of the resource and if if finds it, the category identifier is stored in the list of resource categories.
member.param: List of names of not hierarchical categories
member.returns: The identifiers of the categories as list of string of the resource to load
